glsa.title: pike: SQL injection vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A flaw in the input handling could lead to the execution of arbitrary SQL statements in the underlying PostgreSQL database.

background.p: Pike is a general purpose programming language, able to be used for multiple tasks.

description.p: Some input is not properly sanitised before being used in a SQL statement in the underlying PostgreSQL database.

impact.p: A remote attacker could provide malicious input to a pike program, which might result in the execution of arbitrary SQL statements.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All pike users should upgrade to the latest version:
